summary: So today while sitting in the car with my sister I noticed a Captain Marvel poster slowly falling out of a bus stop style...
body:
So this happened.

So today while sitting in the car with my sister I noticed a Captain Marvel poster slowly falling out of a bus stop style billboard.

Me: I could just go and take that.

Sis: What?? Oh, do it. You want me to get it?

Sis: (jokingly) you distract the security guy and I’ll grab it.

Me: Really, hahaha. That’s… Stealing

Sis: No. “borrowing”

I see it falling again and then see its fallen all the way out.

Me: It’s fallen. Maybe someone was pulling it. It’s on the floor.

Sis: Shall I get it?

Me: It’s on the floor. Go check. If it’s on the floor go get it.

Sis: *starts getting out* I’m a get it. The security man’s going.

Me: Ask him if we can have it.

She walks across to the security guy while he’s shoving the picture on the side and asks if she can have the poster. He looked at her really confused like she’s mad and goes “I’m not sure, let me ask the manager”. While this is happening I’m sitting and laughing my head off with what’s happening in the car. The security guy returns and says sure and gives her the poster, while the Manager inside is also looking very confusedly at her for asking for the poster.

She comes back to me with the GIANT poster, we’re both laughing like mad and she goes “take a picture”.

The poster goes in the boot of the car. And we sit, still laughing.

Me: What! The! Hell!

Sis: We got a Captain Marvel poster

Me: Moms gonna open the boot and go ‘What the hell is this crap’.

We hold it together when mom and dad get back. Mom opens the boot, “huh??”.

Me and sis: *uncontrollable laughing.*

This all happened in the span of 5 min. (or less)

summary: Captain Marvel comes out next week and there is absolutely no hype for it. Don’t you dare say you are going to watch Avengers:...
body: Captain Marvel comes out next week and there is absolutely no hype for it. Don’t you dare say you are going to watch Avengers: Endgame knowing god damn well Carol Danvers is going to be a huge role in the film and not go see Captain Marvel. Go out there and support the movie, support Brie Larson, support badass women. Don’t let this movie flop, it’s such an important film not only for the MCU but for women all over the world

summary: Yeah, hi. If you don’t care about and/or hate Captain Marvel/Carol Danvers, why are you posting about it in those tags? You are...
body:
Yeah, hi. If you don’t care about and/or hate Captain Marvel/Carol Danvers, why are you posting about it in those tags? You are entitled to your views, but you don’t have to crush on other people’s excitement.

Why can’t we all just get along?

tags: sorry for the rant n bant
summary: *sigh* I mean, I got blocked by this pathetic, jowl-having ass, Guy Fieri impersonating, middle aged headass man for saying this...
body:
*sigh* I mean, I got blocked by this pathetic, jowl-having ass, Guy Fieri impersonating, middle aged headass man for saying this but I just wanted to get this off my chest here. I have little interest in seeing Captain Marvel. Nothing against it, as I would watch it solely to see Goose, but I’m not a CM fan and most MCU movies have rarely hooked me to the theaters other than Black Panther [mostly for personal reasons]. Heck, I waited to rent Infinity War for cheap, that being the third MCU movie I’ve seen fully, that’s how disinterested I am in this “Cinematic Universe.”

Again, I have nothing against Captain Marvel, Brie Larson, nor anyone that wants to see it, unless they’re seeing it out of [snobbish] spite which to that I’ll admit… is sad. But, I do want to see Avengers: Endgame and I think it’s wrong to say that “You gotta see Captain Marvel in order to understand Avengers: Endgame“ or “You’re not a true marvel fan until you see this film before Endgame.” Almost exactly what the dude that blocked me said and these people I just wanna smack upside the head.

I have no uncertain doubt that if you watch Avengers: Infinity War, you can watch Endgame fully prepared; that’s the only irrefutable prerequisite I implore onto people interested that haven’t kept up with the MCU. You’ll probably be questioning a couple things here and there, but if a film can’t clue you in on the situations without having to explain everything, it’s not doing its job right.

I didn’t see Doctor Strange and yet not only was his place in Infinity War clear and fully realized, I still got to understand him as a character without seeing his stand alone movie, especially the scene where we see him feel the scars on his hand. I don’t doubt the same can be said for Carol Danvers.

But really, I’m not standing for this gatekeeping crap. However you feel about CM, watching it should not be an obligation to get into the big battle later this spring and nobody should try to say otherwise.

summary: why im not gonna see captain marvel
title: why im not gonna see captain marvel
body: ok so essentially so far what I have seen about captain marvel is ridiculous. i understand what they’re trying to get across with female empowerment and yes that’s a great message but it’s like…. when a character’s main trait is being female, you haven’t created a strong female character, you’ve created a shell with a vagina. not only that, but it’s been strongly insinuated that she will be the one to save everyone and defeat Thanos. Like what the hell kind of lazy a** writing is that. You couldn’t manage to write our 10 years worth of developed characters into a situation where they could create a plan to defeat Thanos without f-ing throwing in this random chick with basically OP endless superpowers ?? and fine, i can accept her saving the day or whatever, had we had 10 years of development like we did for the other characters. WE NEVER EVEN GOT A BLACK WIDOW MOVIE. why dont they build up the STRONG A** female characters they already have and have black widow or scarlet witch save the day rather than some RANDOM A** ALIEN GODDESS. like literally she’s got blonde hair when she flies she literally basically glows,, she can shoot lasers out of her hand and has super strength like… they created a goddess. WHAT KIND OF WOMAN RELATES TO A GODDESS WITH LITERALLY NO PERSONALITY. aside from the fact that she is a woman or the fact that she is a “warrior hero”. i am just ultra disappointed that this movie exists and that Marvel is doing such a cop out, especially for the goal of appealing to the social justice masses. again, they could’ve brought out captain marvel years ago and actually developed her, or given ANY of their other female cast movies… it’s lazy, and i’m not buying it, regardless of what the movie turns out to be. if captain marvel leads the show in endgame, im going to be absolutely done.

Like what the hell kind of lazy a** writing is that. You couldn’t manage to write our 10 years worth of developed characters into a situation where they could create a plan to defeat Thanos without f-ing throwing in this random chick with basically OP endless superpowers ?? and fine, i can accept her saving the day or whatever, had we had 10 years of development like we did for the other characters. WE NEVER EVEN GOT A BLACK WIDOW MOVIE. why dont they build up the STRONG A** female characters they already have and have black widow or scarlet witch save the day rather than some RANDOM A** ALIEN GODDESS. like literally she’s got blonde hair when she flies she literally basically glows,, she can shoot lasers out of her hand and has super strength like… they created a goddess. WHAT KIND OF WOMAN RELATES TO A GODDESS WITH LITERALLY NO PERSONALITY. aside from the fact that she is a woman or the fact that she is a “warrior hero”. i am just ultra disappointed that this movie exists and that Marvel is doing such a cop out, especially for the goal of appealing to the social justice masses. again, they could’ve brought out captain marvel years ago and actually developed her, or given ANY of their other female cast movies… it’s lazy, and i’m not buying it, regardless of what the movie turns out to be. if captain marvel leads the show in endgame, im going to be absolutely done.

blog.name: terxture
blog.title: T E R X T U R E
blog.description:
liv. 19. 
film student.
this is a film blog where i post about everything film. for film reviews follow my letterboxd account: livvysavs

summary: are u excited for captain marvel / avengers endgame ?
question: are u excited for captain marvel / avengers endgame ?
answer:
i wasn’t so hyped about captain marvel but im 100% going to see it as soon as possible and am still counting down the days BUT i am so pumped for endgame you wouldn’t believe. with that comes apprehension though because we all know that at least one of the most beloved mcu characters is going to die and im WAY too attached. to be honest though i might be most excitied about far from home out of all the new MCU releases. spider-man is my favourite superhero (closely followed by captain america) and the premise of the movie is sick and of course the lord himself jake gyllenhaal is in it 

🎥 let’s talk about film 🎥
